pages.text: $(item)Ice Cream$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining at least 1 $(thing)Frozen$() item, 1 $(thing)Dairy$() product, and 1 $(thing)Sweetener$(). No $(thing)Meats$(), $(thing)Vegetables$(), $(thing)Eggs$(), or $(thing)Inedibles$() can be added. $(thing)Fruits$() are an acceptable filler. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
When consumed, $(item)Ice Cream$() immediately removes any status effects from the player.
